Message:
The Holy Night is when
you give a present filled
with all your gratitude
to someone you cherish.
A special time that
comes once a year.

Tonight at the mansion,
everyone’s planning to hold
a party to celebrate the Holy Night,
so there wasn’t a single person
who didn’t look occupied.

Even Sol’s been out helping with
preparations since this morning...

I do nothing but cause
trouble for her, and she always
has to take care of me.

So, I want to express my gratitude
by giving her a present.

After Sol left, I took out
the present I had been
hiding from her.

There’s only a few hours left
until the party starts...
